channel.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
channel.description:
I was thinking about how websites host other templates for free and for a premium. Well, when they put them up for premium and sell for a certain price, do they protect them from transfer to other IP adresses?
What I'm trying to say is, if you can buy a web template from a site that hosts an expensive template, can you just buy it and then fork it over to your friend without him having to pay? Or is there something protecting it from being transfered. I basically want to know because I'm thinking about making templates for a premium, and I don't want everyone just purchasing once and giving it to your friends or hosting it in a download somewhere.

item.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:4, topic:308379"]No.

Edit: if you made the template you can put in your copyright if people can distribute it etc, but it’s not like that will stop people, unless you catch them you cannot do anything.[/quote]I know… I’m saying the only way to catch anyone is to coincidentally find your template on a site you didn’t sell to…? In which case, how do template hosts make any money if everyone’s fucking them over?

Read full topic

item.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Put something on it like what on the ketchup packets. “Not for resale”, just change it up a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

No.

Edit: if you made the template you can put in your copyright if people can distribute it etc, but it’s not like that will stop people, unless you catch them you cannot do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

So there’s no real way to protect it from illegal distribution other than manually searching for a non-purchased template hosted on a site?

Read full topic

item.title: Web Template Copyright Protection
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

If you purchase the template you need to read the copyright notice, if they will allow you to distribute the template or not.

Read full topic
